page.title: 12Education
page.content: There are lots of different schools in Tonbridge,{primary, secondary}and {private.}There is one{Roman Catholic school.In Tonbridge we start school at five, with the exception of some private schools.At the age of eleven we have some{selection tests.}If you get a selective place you can go to a {Grammar school.}If not, you go to a {Secondary Modern.}In a primary school the main subjects are Maths and English.There is a new system coming up in 1987 called the 16+.This will be instead of'O'levels.There ought to be more facilities in the schools, for leisure and technical things like {computers.}Without education the world would be very primitive because no one would know how to work technical things.
